# Meta-Agentic Project Scaffold

A scaffold for creating an agent that can be implemented in various environments and use cases.

## Installation

To install the scaffold, run the following command:

```bash
npm install meta-agentic-project-scaffold
```

## Usage

To use the scaffold, include the following lines in your code:

```javascript
const MetaAgenticProject = require('meta-agentic-project-scaffold');

const agent = new MetaAgenticProject();
agent.initialize();
```

## Features

- Easy to implement
- Highly customizable
- Supports multiple environments
